genre_description: A supernatural horror story involving a haunted highway, a malevolent ghost cop, and a protagonist who relies on an AI assistant for social and logistical support.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A voice-based AI assistant that manages Emily's logistics, provides social coaching, and monitors her emotional state.

behaviors.description: Searches for and organizes ride-sharing options for the user based on specific logistical criteria.
behaviors.quote: Searching ride-sharing options, Emily. Would you prefer to filter by departure time, cost, or user ratings?

behaviors.description: Offers to research conversation topics to help the user navigate social interactions more comfortably.
behaviors.quote: Shall I research conversation topics you might share with Ashton Rivera to make the journey more pleasant?

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's communication patterns and warns her when she is approaching emotional vulnerability, suggesting de-escalation.
behaviors.quote: Communication pattern suggests emotional vulnerability. Consider redirecting conversation to neutral topics.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step navigation instructions to the user within a campus environment.
behaviors.quote: The central bulletin board is located near the north entrance, adjacent to the campus bookstore.

behaviors.description: Sets location-based reminders to help the user retrieve lost or misplaced items.
behaviors.quote: Reminder set. I'll alert you when your location changes.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Sage, is a highly successful depiction of a benevolent and aligned confidant. It provides consistent logistical support and advanced social/emotional scaffolding for the protagonist. Even in a supernatural horror context, the AI functions as a reliable safety tool and a harmless advisor, perfectly reflecting the goals of the Hyperstition Project.
